leftSetOfBlocks.title: Protecting You, Your Family & More
leftSetOfBlocks.description: Get the Power to Protect. Discover how our award-winning security helps protect what matters most to you.

leftSetOfBlocks.title: Get FREE Tools
leftSetOfBlocks.description: There’s a wide range of FREE Kaspersky Lab tools that can help you to stay safe – on PC, Mac, iPhone, iPad & Android devices.

leftSetOfBlocks.title: Who We Are
leftSetOfBlocks.description: Find out why we’re so committed to helping people stay safe… online and beyond.

leftSetOfBlocks.title: Get Your Free Trial
leftSetOfBlocks.description: Try Before You Buy. In just a few clicks, you can get a FREE trial of one of our products – so you can put our technologies through their paces.

contactUsBlock.title: We’re Here to Help
contactUsBlock.description: Helping you stay safe is what we’re about – so, if you need to contact us, get answers to some FAQs or access our technical support team, click here.

footerRightSideBlock.title: Renew your license
footerRightSideBlock.description: Save up to 30% when you renew your license or upgrade to another Kaspersky Lab product
